channel.title: Skill comand
channel.description:
ok so im trying to add a comand to my server that when u type it in u get the skillcape if u dont understand here is an example
when the players type ::agility and the player has 99 agility he will receive the skillcape and hood
but when he dusnt have 99 in agility i will send a message saying that u need 99 agility to get that skillcape
so could anyone make that command for me i would really apreaciate it
Thx [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 18, 2007, 09:39:23 AM[/size][hr]is there no one on this community that nows how to make these
